translated: The Collection of Birth Stories (Ekakanipāta)🔽The Chapter on the Cave (Kulāvakavagga)
The Birth Story of the Cave (Kulāvakajātaka)
“Mātali, avoid the cave in the simbali tree,
With the tip of the chariot’s pole.
We would rather give up our lives among the asuras,
Than for our children to be deformed.”
The Birth Story of the Cave (first).
